hero.subtitle: For over a century, Arya Homoeo Hall has been a beacon of hope for those seeking natural, holistic healing.

clinicProfile.name: Arya Homoeo Hall
clinicProfile.addressText: Petrol Pump Dharmkata Se Purab, Khatuaha Chowk ,Bihar 848117
clinicProfile.hoursText: Mon-Sat: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM | Sunday: 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM

programs.title: Specialized Care Programs
programs.subtitle: Our expertise in paralysis and polio treatment is backed by generations of clinical experience and thousands of success stories.

items.title: Paralysis Recovery Program
items.shortDescription: Comprehensive treatment focusing on restoring movement and function through natural methods.

items.title: Polio Management
items.shortDescription: Specialized care for polio patients emphasizing quality of life and functional improvement.

items.title: Neural Care & Wellness
items.shortDescription: Preventive and curative treatments for overall nervous system health and vitality.

testimonials.title: Stories of Hope & Healing
testimonials.subtitle: Real patients, real recovery. These testimonials represent the thousands of lives transformed through our natural healing approach.

items.name: R.K.
items.quote: After my stroke, I couldn't move my left side. Within 8 months of treatment at Arya Homoeo Hall, I can now walk without support. The care and patience shown by the doctors gave me hope when I had none.

hero.subtitle: For over a century, Arya Homoeo Hall has been a beacon of hope for those seeking natural, holistic healing. Specializing in paralysis and polio care, we combine time-tested homeopathic wisdom with compassionate treatment.

legacy.subtitle: From humble beginnings in 1924 to becoming a trusted name in homeopathic paralysis and polio care, our journey reflects dedication, innovation, and unwavering commitment to patient wellbeing.

experience.title: 100 Years of Experience
experience.quote:
What began as a single practitioner's vision has grown into a legacy of healing.
We've witnessed medical evolution while staying true to the core principles of
homeopathy— treating the whole person, not just symptoms.
experience.author: — The Arya Family Legacy
